snippet: Good friends and fashion-industry vets, such as the designer Kate Young and the models Daria Strokous and Liu Wen, gathered for the designer’s fund-raiser on Thursday.
abstract: Good friends and fashion-industry vets, such as the designer Kate Young and the models Daria Strokous and Liu Wen, gathered for the designer’s fund-raiser on Thursday.

headline.main: About Last Night | Jason Wu Hosts a Summer Soiree for the Young Friends of ACRIA
